page.title: 16THE MOTHERWELL MARATHON
page.content: On Sunday 19th May at 9am Andy stood nervously at Wishaw Sports Centre with 474 others who were trying to emulate A. Bird. They were going to run in the 3rd Motherwell Marathon. When they had completed the course which ran throughout Motherwell District they returned to the Sports Centre, where there were many entertainments, including a Pipe Band, amusements, an Army Shooting range and a puppet show. Although the course had been reckoned to be hard, only 11 runners failed to finish. Most runners like Andy were running for fun or charity but a few were serious athletes.
